Package com.example.ex5.controllers

Class SignupController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex5.controllers.SignupController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/signup") @Validated public class SignupController extends Object
Controller for handling user signup requests.

    • signupSubmit

      @PostMapping public String signupSubmit(@ModelAttribute @Valid @Valid User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam(required=false) String ownerCode)
      Handles the signup form submission.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object containing signup details
      model - the model to be used
      ownerCode - optional owner code for admin role
      Returns:
      redirect to the login page if successful, or back to the signup form with error message if unsuccessful
